text: It ’ s hard to imagine Kim Kardashian being married to anyone but Kanye West. However, she ’ s been married not just once, but twice before him. Each marriage for Kardashian has been completely different from the other, and they help us see how much she and West are truly meant to be together. Here ’ s an inside look at each of Kardashian ’ s three marriages.
